name: Reflecting Reflections
description:
Reflecting Reflections is a combination of Real Time Strategy, Wave Defense and Puzzle Solving.




Collect - Gather Sticks, Stones, and Silver from the Trees, Rocks and the wandering Wanderers.

Prepare - Command your Attackers and place your Defenders while you await the upcoming battle.

Destroy - Send your Attackers toward the Enemy, eliminate the Enemy's base and capture their Star.


Fortify - Scout the map and position your Defenders accordingly.

Protect - Stop the hundreds of Attackers from overwhelming your base.


Explore - Use your reflect ability to quickly navigate around the map. Spin and Track your movement to unlock new locations. Stay alive under the pressures of many Attackers and Defenders.


Something for Everyone - 3 distinct modes that offer new ways to play.

Many Explosions - Watch 1000's of Attackers and Defenders blow up.

Never Stuck - Can't beat a level, skip it. There is no requirement to complete a level to unlock the next and each mode can be played independently.
